body_html: Also modify other files imitating what's done for contrib.rnn, I hope this will do. One question out of curiosity though, from contrib.cmake's readme, it seems like they don't support custom_op libraries and most cotrib, so why are we still adding modules from contrib? Just to avoid the ImportError I encountered? or prepare for future support?

body: Also modify other files imitating what's done for `contrib.rnn`, I hope this will do. *One question out of curiosity though, from `contrib.cmake`'s readme, it seems like they don't support custom_op libraries and most cotrib, so why are we still adding modules from contrib? Just to avoid the `ImportError` I encountered? or prepare for future support?*
